data.eml:eml: Trichromothrips genus-group (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) from Vietnam, with descriptions of new species in both Okajimaella and Paithrips

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Masumoto, Masami, Okajima, Shûji (2012): Trichromothrips genus-group (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) from Vietnam, with descriptions of new species in both Okajimaella and Paithrips. Zootaxa 3313: 1-11, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211441
